name: seattle

a large city in the northwestern US state of Washington: The couple are now living in Seattle. Seattle is a great place to work.
More examplesFewer examplesRay bought a one-way ticket to Seattle.Seattle is one of my favourite cities in the world.The hotel is very close to Seattle's creative arts district.
